snippet: Dan Glickman of the U.S. Global Leadership Coalition and Guerda L. Constant of Fondasyon Limye Lavi respond to a column by Nicholas D. Kristof.
lead_paragraph: Dan Glickman of the U.S. Global Leadership Coalition and Guerda L. Constant of Fondasyon Limye Lavi respond to a column by Nicholas D. Kristof.

headline.main: Foreign Aid Saves Lives. It’s Good Policy, Too.
headline.print_headline: Foreign Aid Saves Lives. It’s Good Policy, Too.
